Schema
+-- Table: users [PK: id]
|   +-- Columns
|   |   +-- id INTEGER [PK, AUTO, NOT NULL]
|   |   +-- name TEXT [NOT NULL]
|   |   +-- email TEXT [NOT NULL]
|   |   \-- created_at TIMESTAMP [NOT NULL, DEFAULT NOW()]
|   \-- Indexes
|       \-- UNIQUE idx_users_email (email)
\-- Table: posts [PK: id]
    +-- Columns
    |   +-- id INTEGER [PK, AUTO, NOT NULL]
    |   +-- user_id INTEGER [NOT NULL]
    |   +-- title TEXT [NOT NULL]
    |   \-- content TEXT
    +-- Indexes
    |   \-- idx_posts_user (user_id)
    \-- Foreign Keys
        \-- fk_posts_user: user_id -> users.id ON DELETE CASCADE
